articles.author: Samuel Osborne
articles.title: P&O ferry the European Causeway detained over safety concerns after 'failures' training new crew - Sky News
articles.content:
A P&O ferry has been detained in Northern Ireland on safety grounds - just days after 800 workers were sacked without notice and replaced with cheaper workers.
The Maritime and Coastguard Agency… [+3083 chars]

articles.author: Clifford Krauss
articles.title: Europe and the U.S. Make Ambitious Plans to Reduce Reliance on Russian Gas - The New York Times
articles.description: President Biden said the United States would send more natural gas to Europe, though he did not specify how given that the U.S. is already near its export capacity.
articles.content: There is no way to ramp up U.S. L.N.G. exports and deliver on the imperative climate commitments that the U.S. and E.U. have pledged, said Abigail Dillen, the president of Earthjustice, an environmen… [+2375 chars]

articles.title: Joe Biden visits Poland in show of support for eastern European nations - The Guardian
articles.description: US president makes surprise visit to Polish town of Rzeszów about an hour from Ukrainian border
